statements: SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id FROM customer_survey_responses;
SELECT satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score FROM customer_survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score FROM customer_survey_responses GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_score > 4;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM customer_survey_responses;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_responses FROM customer_survey_responses GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT response, survey_id FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT response FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE time_stamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM overall_satisfaction_trends WHERE satisfaction_score BETWEEN 4 AND 5 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_id, satisfaction_score FROM overall_satisfaction_trends;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, response FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT survey_id, response FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE response LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM overall_satisfaction_trends WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_date FROM overall_satisfaction_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_questions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT response_value FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_responses ORDER BY survey_date DESC, satisfaction_score ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM customer_survey_responses GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(response_id) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score FROM customer_survey_responses GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_score DESC;

SELECT cs.customer_id, sq.question_text, sr.response_value FROM customer_survey_responses cs JOIN survey_responses sr ON cs.response_id = sr.response_id JOIN survey_questions sq ON sr.question_id = sq.question_id WHERE cs.customer_id = 123;

SELECT cs.customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT sq.question_id) AS total_questions_answered FROM customer_survey_responses cs JOIN survey_responses sr ON cs.response_id = sr.response_id JOIN survey_questions sq ON sr.question_id = sq.question_id GROUP BY cs.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sq.question_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, active FROM surveys
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_text FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT survey_name, description FROM surveys WHERE active = TRUE
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating, survey_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE LENGTH(question_text) > 50;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT survey_date, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT SurveyResponses.response_id, SurveyQuestions.question_text FROM SurveyResponses JOIN SurveyQuestions ON SurveyResponses.question_id = SurveyQuestions.question_id;

SELECT CustomerDetails.customer_name, SurveyResults.overall_satisfaction FROM CustomerDetails JOIN SurveyResults ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = SurveyResults.response_id WHERE SurveyResults.overall_satisfaction NOT LIKE 'Dissatisfied';
